thread.title: ICYMI There's A New Dating Show About Getting Undressed And Chilling In Bed With A Stranger
thread.title_full: ICYMI There's A New Dating Show About Getting Undressed And Chilling In Bed With A Stranger

author: Tahlia Pritchard
title: ICYMI There's A New Dating Show About Getting Undressed And Chilling In Bed With A Stranger
text:
View this image ›
SBS ID: 10301890 2. That’s literally what’s going to happen on the new SBS show Undressed . View this image ›
SBS ID: 10302214 3. The show originated in Italy, and puts participants of different cultural backgrounds together to challenge preconceptions about race and sexuality. View this image ›
SBS The show was inspired by research that suggests attraction can be accelerated by encouraging physical and emotional contact.
ID: 10301900 4. Each couple meets in a room only furnished with a bed, TV, (and a few sneaky cameras), and instructions flash up on the TV, guiding them through the process. View this image ›
SBS At the conclusion of the date, each person is given a choice as to whether they want to stay and get to know the other person better, or end the date.
ID: 10301907 5. And let’s just say, the promo makes it look veeeery interesting. SBS
SBS
 ID: 10302258 6. While some parts look kinda ridiculous… View this image ›
SBS ID: 10302302 7. …there’s no doubt some interesting and valid points will be raised. View this image ›
SBS ID: 10302306 8. 100% hooked already. View this image ›
SBS ID: 10302263 9. You can watch the full promo here. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=UyruQXzfKQk . youtube.com Undressed premieres January 16.
ID: 10302323
Tahlia Pritchard is a senior writer for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
